sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Grid, Hidden, Typography, AppBar, Toolbar, IconButton, } from '@material-ui/core' import { Logo, Facebook, Instagram, Youtube, Twitter, Whatsapp, Telegram, HelpIcon, StoreIcon, BusinessIcon, PlIcon, Avatar } from '../../elements/icons' import {Localization} from '../../elements/localization/Localization' import {LeftDrawer} from './drawer/Drawer' import {useStyles} from './useStyle' export const TopHeader = (props) => { const {t} = props; const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const classes = useStyles(); return (
{t('location')}:
{t('region')}
{t('help')}
{t('shops')}
{t('forBusiness')}
{/* Adaptive */} setIsOpen(true)} >
) }
